Preparatory committee formed in Russia
articles.content:
Preparatory committee formed in Russia 
    Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- The Maritime Territorial Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, the Maritime Territorial Women's Union, the Maritime Territorial Officers' Union held a joint meeting on February 2 and inaugurated a preparatory committee for celebrating the February holiday and commemorating Sun's Day.
 First secretary of the Maritime Territorial Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation V. V. Grishukov was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.

Floral basket to Kim Jong Il from Palestinian President
articles.content:
Floral basket to Kim Jong Il from Palestinian President 
    Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il received a floral basket from President of the state of Palestine Yasser Arafat on the occasion of his birthday.
 The basket was conveyed to foreign minister Paek Nam Sun by Palestinian ambassador to Korea Shaher Mohammed Abdlah on Wednesday.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Il from Fidel Castro Ruz
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Il from Fidel Castro Ruz 
    Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il received a message of greetings from Fidel Castro Ruz, President of the council of state and President of the council of ministers of Cuba, on February 7 on the occasion of his birthday. 
 The message extended warmest congratulations to him on his birthday in the name of the Communist Party, government and people of Cuba and sincerely wished him good health and happiness as well as success in his work.    
 The message reiterated the firm will to steadily develop the friendly and cooperative relations between the two parties, two governments and two peoples based on the noble idea of socialism and patriotism.
